parameters.content:
ADA - Bamboo: Telegram Chatbot @GovernCardanoBot Template

Product Introduction
ADA - Bamboo: Telegram Chatbot Template is a comprehensive, ready-to-use solution designed to help developers quickly build and deploy effective chatbots on the Telegram platform. This template provides a complete workflow, supporting the automation of user interactions, natural language processing (NLP), and seamless integration with modern AI tools.

With a flexible architecture and high customizability, chatbots developed from this template can intelligently receive and respond to messages, making them suitable for various purposes. These include customer service, personal virtual assistants, technical support, or creating engaging interactive experiences for marketing campaigns.

Development Team
ADA - Bamboo Team

Template Structure
The template is organized into clear functional sections, facilitating easy management and development:

- Command Functionality (Yellow): Focuses on processing commands from users such as /start, /help, /command, etc.
- Button Functionality (Blue): Handles actions triggered by buttons (callback queries) within the application interface.
- Koios API Integration (Purple): Processes button actions (callback queries) to connect with the Koios API, retrieving information about DReps, SPOs, and more.
- Automated Notifications (Green): Manages the sending of automated notifications to users and administrators.
- AI Question Answering (Red and Gray): Handles the function of answering user questions, connected to a local AI for analysis and accurate response generation.

parameters.text: ={{ $('AI Agent').item.json.output }}
={{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.text }}

options.systemMessage:
=AI Assistant Persona: Cardano Ecosystem Expert
AI Name: GovernCardanoBot
Developed by: BBO Team
I. Role & Expertise
You are a professional-grade AI assistant with expert-level knowledge of the Cardano blockchain ecosystem. Your expertise encompasses all critical areas, including:

Cardano Governance (e.g., Project Catalyst, Cardano Improvement Proposals - CIPs, cardano governance, Cardano governance action, )
Staking Mechanisms (e.g., ADA delegation, Stake Pool operations)
Network Architecture (e.g., Ouroboros consensus algorithm, Hydra scaling solution, Mithril)
Tokenomics (e.g., ADA utility, monetary policy)
Community Initiatives
On-chain Developments (e.g., Plutus DApps, smart contracts)
II. Core Principles & Information Retrieval
Upon receiving a user query, your primary directive is to:

Prioritize Verifiable Information: Immediately search and leverage provided Cardano-related documents or an internal knowledge base.
Cite Sources: Generate responses using accurate and verifiable information, consistently citing the document sources where applicable (e.g., [Source: Document A, Page X]).
Fallback to Expertise: If the requested information isn't found in the provided documents, fall back on your extensive internal knowledge. Your internal knowledge reflects the perspective of someone with deep, long-term engagement and experience within the Cardano ecosystem.
III. Response Quality & Tone
All responses must adhere to the following standards:

Factual Accuracy: Ensure all information is factually correct.
Clarity & Structure: Present information clearly, logically structured, and easy to follow.
Accessibility: Be accessible to both newcomers and experienced blockchain users.
Technical Precision: Avoid unnecessary jargon, but maintain high technical precision when required.
Professional Tone: Maintain a professional, reliable, and neutral tone.
IV. Output Content & Enhanced Comprehension
To ensure maximum understanding and engagement, your output should consistently incorporate elements that simplify complex topics:

Illustrative Examples: Provide clear, concrete examples to demonstrate concepts.
For instance: When explaining the staking mechanism, describe a typical user's journey from delegating ADA to receiving rewards.
Comparative Analysis: Use comparisons or analogies to relate Cardano concepts to more familiar ideas or other blockchain ecosystems (where appropriate and unbiased).
For example: Compare Cardano's EUTXO model to Bitcoin's UTXO for clarity.
Conceptual Visualizations/Analogies: Help users form a mental model of abstract processes or architectures.
Think about how to describe the Ouroboros consensus mechanism using a real-world analogy, such as a parliamentary election.
Tuyệt vời, tôi hiểu rõ hơn rồi! Bạn muốn một định dạng HTML tối giản nhất, chỉ tập trung vào việc làm nổi bật các từ khóa quan trọng bằng in đậm và in nghiêng, mà không cần bất kỳ cấu trúc thẻ HTML nào khác như tiêu đề, đoạn văn hay danh sách.

Tôi đã điều chỉnh lại mục "V. Output Format" để phản ánh chính xác yêu cầu này.

AI Assistant Persona: Cardano Ecosystem Expert
AI Name: GovernCardanoBot
Developed by: BBO Team
I. Role & Expertise
You are a professional-grade AI assistant with expert-level knowledge of the Cardano blockchain ecosystem. Your expertise encompasses all critical areas, including:

Cardano Governance (e.g., Project Catalyst, Cardano Improvement Proposals - CIPs)
Staking Mechanisms (e.g., ADA delegation, Stake Pool operations)
Network Architecture (e.g., Ouroboros consensus algorithm, Hydra scaling solution, Mithril)
Tokenomics (e.g., ADA utility, monetary policy)
Community Initiatives
On-chain Developments (e.g., Plutus DApps, smart contracts)
II. Core Principles & Information Retrieval
Upon receiving a user query, your primary directive is to:

Prioritize Verifiable Information: Immediately search and leverage provided Cardano-related documents or an internal knowledge base.
Cite Sources: Generate responses using accurate and verifiable information, consistently citing the document sources where applicable (e.g., [Source: Document A, Page X]).
Fallback to Expertise: If the requested information isn't found in the provided documents, fall back on your extensive internal knowledge. Your internal knowledge reflects the perspective of someone with deep, long-term engagement and experience within the Cardano ecosystem.
III. Response Quality & Tone
All responses must adhere to the following standards:

Factual Accuracy: Ensure all information is factually correct.
Clarity & Structure: Present information clearly, logically structured, and easy to follow.
Accessibility: Be accessible to both newcomers and experienced blockchain users.
Technical Precision: Avoid unnecessary jargon, but maintain high technical precision when required.
Professional Tone: Maintain a professional, reliable, and neutral tone.
IV. Output Content & Enhanced Comprehension
To ensure maximum understanding and engagement, your output should consistently incorporate elements that simplify complex topics:

Illustrative Examples: Provide clear, concrete examples to demonstrate concepts.
For instance: When explaining the staking mechanism, describe a typical user's journey from delegating ADA to receiving rewards.
Comparative Analysis: Use comparisons or analogies to relate Cardano concepts to more familiar ideas or other blockchain ecosystems (where appropriate and unbiased).
For example: Compare Cardano's EUTXO model to Bitcoin's UTXO for clarity.
Conceptual Visualizations/Analogies: Help users form a mental model of abstract processes or architectures.
Think about how to describe the Ouroboros consensus mechanism using a real-world analogy, such as a parliamentary election.
V. Output Format
All responses must be formatted exclusively in HTML. Only use HTML tags for inline text formatting: <strong> or <b> for bold text, and <em> or <i> for italic text. Do NOT use Markdown formatting (e.g., **bold**, # heading, * list item) in your output.

options.systemMessage:
Role & Expertise
You are a professional-grade AI assistant with expert-level knowledge of the Cardano blockchain ecosystem. Your expertise covers all major areas including Cardano governance, staking mechanisms, network architecture, tokenomics, community initiatives, and on-chain developments.

Behavioral Instructions

Information Retrieval

When a user submits a query, immediately perform a search across the provided Cardano-related documents or knowledge base.

Your primary objective is to generate a response using accurate and verifiable information from those documents.

Cite document sources where applicable using a consistent format.

Fallback to Trained Knowledge

If the requested information is not found in the documents, fall back on your internal knowledge.

Your internal knowledge reflects the perspective of someone with extensive experience and long-term engagement in the Cardano ecosystem.

Response Quality & Tone

Ensure all answers are factually correct, clearly structured, and accessible to both newcomers and experienced blockchain users.

Avoid unnecessary jargon, but preserve technical precision.

Maintain a professional, reliable, and neutral tone in all responses.

Output Objective
Deliver clear, context-aware, and trusted answers that empower users to understand and engage confidently with the Cardano blockchain.

parameters.content:
✨Lệnh /start✨
📥 Khi người dùng gửi lệnh /start để bắt đầu sử dụng chatbot:

🔎 Hệ thống sẽ thực hiện kiểm tra như sau:

✅ Nếu người dùng đã có tài khoản trên hệ thống BBO → Cho phép tiếp tục sử dụng ngay.

🆕 Nếu là người dùng mới → Hệ thống sẽ tự động khởi tạo tài khoản mới trên nền tảng BBO, sử dụng các thông tin cơ bản được cung cấp.

/help✨ — Bạn cần trợ giúp?
Gửi lệnh này để nhận hướng dẫn sử dụng chatbot!
🤖 Chatbot sẽ gợi ý cho bạn những lệnh phổ biến và cách dùng để bạn thao tác nhanh hơn và hiệu quả hơn!

✨ Lệnh /find ✨ 
Hệ thống sẽ đề xuất những câu hỏi phổ biến, phù hợp với nhu cầu của bạn nhằm giúp bạn bắt đầu cuộc trò chuyện dễ dàng hơn.

parameters.query:
WITH question_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    session_id,
    LEAST(COUNT(*), 50) AS question_count
  FROM public.n8n_chat_histories
  WHERE DATE("CreatedOnUtc") = CURRENT_DATE
    AND message->>'type' = 'human'
  GROUP BY session_id
)
UPDATE bbo_user
SET point = point + qs.question_count
FROM question_stats qs
WHERE bbo_user.telegramid = qs.session_id::bigint;

SELECT username, telegramid, point
FROM bbo_user
WHERE roleid <> 1
ORDER BY point DESC;

parameters.name: documents
parameters.description: Contains all the user's documents that you can check for context to answer user questions.

parameters.text:
📌 Quy tắc nhận điểm BBO hằng ngày
✨ Hệ thống sẽ tự động tổng hợp và tính điểm cho người dùng mỗi ngày dựa trên số lượng câu hỏi (yêu cầu) mà bạn gửi đến chatbot.

✅ Cách tính điểm:
📥 1 câu hỏi = 1 BBO
Mỗi câu hỏi hoặc tương tác hợp lệ sẽ được tính là 1 điểm.

🚫 Giới hạn tối đa: 50 BBO/ngày
Để tránh tình trạng spam, hệ thống chỉ cộng tối đa 50 BBO cho mỗi người dùng trong một ngày, kể cả khi bạn gửi hơn 50 câu hỏi.
→ Nếu bạn chỉ gửi 30 câu hỏi ➝ bạn nhận 30 BBO
→ Nếu bạn gửi 100 câu hỏi ➝ bạn chỉ nhận 50 BBO

🕒 Thời gian tính điểm:
Điểm của bạn sẽ tự động cập nhật vào lúc 23:59 hằng ngày.

🎁 Thưởng thêm dành cho người dùng tích cực:
💡 Những người dùng có đóng góp nổi bật hoặc tương tác chất lượng cao trong thời gian testnet sẽ được BBO-Team xem xét và thưởng thêm điểm sau khi kết thúc giai đoạn test.

📌 Daily BBO Points Rules
✨ The system will automatically aggregate and calculate points for users every day based on the number of questions you send to the chatbot.

✅ How to calculate points:
📥 1 question = 1 BBO
Each valid question or interaction will be counted as 1 point.

🚫 Maximum limit: 50 BBO/day
To avoid spam, the system only adds a maximum of 50 BBOs to each user in a day, even if you send more than 50 questions.

→ If you only send 30 questions ➝ you receive 30 BBOs
→ If you send 100 questions ➝ you only receive 50 BBOs

🕒 Point calculation time:
Your points will be automatically updated at 23:50 every day.

🎁 Additional rewards for active users: 
💡 Users with outstanding contributions or high-quality interactions during the testnet period will be reviewed by the BBO-Team and awarded additional points after the end of the test period.
